message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180.  I think it's a great deal for something of this quality. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $150. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $165?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $155 for the product. I hope this meets within your range.
